verses.verse: "My spirit <S%H7307><s%> is broken, <S%H2254><s%> my days <S%H3117><s%> are extinguished, <S%H2193><s%> The grave <S%H6913><s%> is [ready] for me.
"Surely <S%H518><s%> <S%H3808><s%> mockers <S%H2049><s%> are with me, And my eye <S%H5869><s%> gazes <S%H3885><s%> on their provocation. <S%H4784><s%>
"Lay <S%H7760><s%> down, <S%H7760><s%> now, <S%H4994><s%> a pledge <S%H6162><s%> for me with Thyself; Who <S%H4310><s%> is there that will be my guarantor <S%H8628><s%> <S%H3027><s%>?
"For Thou hast kept <S%H6845><s%> their heart <S%H3820><s%> from understanding; <S%H7922><s%> Therefore <S%H5921><s%> <S%H3651><s%> Thou wilt not exalt <S%H7311><s%> [them.]
"He who informs <S%H5046><s%> against friends <S%H7453><s%> for a share <S%H2506><s%> [of the spoil,] The eyes <S%H5869><s%> of his children <S%H1121><s%> also shall languish. <S%H3615><s%>
"But He has made <S%H3322><s%> me a byword <S%H4914><s%> of the people, <S%H5971><s%> And I am <S%H1961><s%> one at whom men spit. <S%H8611><s%>
"My eye <S%H5869><s%> has also grown <S%H3543><s%> dim <S%H3543><s%> because <S%H4480><s%> of grief, <S%H9213><s%> And all <S%H3605><s%> my members <S%H3338><s%> are as a shadow. <S%H6738><s%>
"The upright <S%H3477><s%> shall be appalled <S%H8074><s%> at this, <S%H384><s%> And the innocent <S%H9345><s%> shall stir <S%H5782><s%> up himself against <S%H5921><s%> the godless. <S%H2611><s%>

"Nevertheless the righteous <S%H6662><s%> shall hold <S%H270><s%> to his way, <S%H1870><s%> And he who has clean <S%H2889><s%> hands <S%H3027><s%> shall grow <S%H3254><s%> stronger <S%H555><s%> and stronger.
"But come <S%H935><s%> again <S%H7725><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> of you now, <S%H4994><s%> For I do not find <S%H4672><s%> a wise <S%H2450><s%> man <S%H2450><s%> among you.
"My days <S%H3117><s%> are past, <S%H5674><s%> my plans <S%H2154><s%> are torn <S%H5423><s%> apart, <S%H5423><s%> [Even] the wishes <S%H4180><s%> of my heart. <S%H3824><s%>
"They make <S%H7760><s%> night <S%H3915><s%> into day, <S%H3117><s%> [saying,] 'The light <S%H216><s%> is near, <S%H7138><s%>' in the presence <S%H6440><s%> of darkness. <S%H2822><s%>
"If <S%H518><s%> I look <S%H6960><s%> for Sheol <S%H7585><s%> as my home, <S%H1004><s%> I make <S%H7502><s%> my bed <S%H3326><s%> in the darkness; <S%H2822><s%>
If I call <S%H7121><s%> to the pit, <S%H7845><s%> 'You are my father'; To the worm, <S%H1><s%> 'my mother <S%H7415><s%> and my sister <S%H517><s%>';
Where <S%H346><s%> now <S%H645><s%> is my hope <S%H8615><s%>? And who <S%H4310><s%> regards <S%H7789><s%> my hope <S%H8615><s%>?
"Will it go <S%H3381><s%> down <S%H3381><s%> with me to Sheol <S%H7585><s%>? Shall we together <S%H3162><s%> go <S%H5183><s%> down <S%H5183><s%> into the dust <S%H6083><s%>?"
